metadata.title: CVE-2022-1215 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
A format string vulnerability was found in libinput

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-1215` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libinput-bin - 1.18.1-1ubuntu0.1
libinput-tools - 1.18.1-1ubuntu0.1
libinput10 - 1.18.1-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

notes.note: amurray> According to the upstream notification, this vulnerability only affects libinput since 1.10 and so may not affect libinput in xenial.

criterions.comment: libinput package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.18.1-1ubuntu0.1').
